sentences: Sieglinde Maria Ahrens (born 19 February 1936, in Berlin) is a German organist and composer.
She is the daughter of (Johannes Clemens) Joseph Ahrens (1904–1997), a German composer and organist.
She is the daughter of (Johannes Clemens) Joseph Ahrens (1904–1997), a German composer and organist. Ahrens studied music and composition under her father.
DREI GESÄNGE NACH LATEINISCHEN PSALMTEXTEN (1963) Bass solo, Organ
SUITE (1959) OrganAherns' work has been issued on CD including:
Eben - Organ Works by Petr Eben, Sieglinde Ahrens, and Martin Lenniger (Audio CD - 1992)
